item.title: Pokemon GO: How to Get Shiny Popplio, Shiny Brionne, & Shiny Primarina
item.description:
Shiny Pokemon are a favorite feature for many fans of the franchise, with plenty of enthusiasts taking on the shiny hunter role and spending hours tracking these rare variants down. Pokemon GO is no stranger to the inclusion of these rarities, with many different shiny variants of Pokemon species that can be obtained through various methods or special opportunities.

Shiny Popplio, plus its evolutions, shiny Brionne, and shiny Primarina are three Pokemon that have shiny variants available in the game. As one of the starter Pokemon evolution lines from the Alola Region, these are popular choices for shiny enthusiasts. For this reason, players who are seeking them out can find all of the information they'll need to prepare for this hunt in the guide below.

How to Get Shiny Popplio, Shiny Brionne, & Shiny Primarina in Pokemon GO

Generally, each member of the Popplio evolution line has different ways in which their shiny variant can be obtained. This is because factors such as some evolved Pokemon being less likely to appear in the wild, or being locked to special events or Raids. Luckily, all three members of the Popplio evolution line do have shiny variants in Pokemon GO that can be obtained by dedicated players.

How to Obtain Shiny Popplio

  • In general, shiny Popplio can be obtained as a wild encounter. However, this is also quite a rare occurrence, as players will need to encounter multiple of the creatures to raise their chances of striking gold with a chance shiny encounter.
  • Aside from this, Popplio has been featured as a 1-Star Raid Boss in the past, so it may possibly come back into rotation at some point. Raid Battles are a much more consistent chance to shiny hunt, as players can farm encounters with the same target.

How to Obtain Shiny Brionne

  • Shiny Brionne can be most easily obtained by simply evolving a shiny Popplio - though, this is provided players are able to successfully obtain a shiny Popplio beforehand,
  • Other than this, Brionne has been a 3-Star Raid boss in the past, so it may possibly come back into rotation.

How to Obtain Shiny Primarina

  • Shiny Primarina can only be obtainable by evolving a shiny Brionne.

Other Ways to Obtain Shiny Popplio, Shiny Brionne, & Shiny Primarina

Some events may feature members of the Popplio evolution line as increased wild spawns, research encounters, or Raids. These events often already have increased spawn rates for featured Pokemon, which can further be boosted with items such as Lures to farm as many encounters as possible and provide the best chance at meeting shiny odds.

An example of this is the 2024 Popplio Community Day , which is taking place on August 31 as part of the Shared Skies Season.

During this three-hour event, Popplio will have boosted spawn rates in the wild, as well as increased rates for encountering the shiny variant of this creature . This is a solid opportunity for players to obtain shiny Popplio, or even evolve it into shiny Brionne or shiny Primarina, so players should look to make the most of it.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Best Moveset For Mega Salamence
item.description:
In Pokemon GO , PvE and PvP battles are a key feature of gameplay, offering various opportunities for players to take on powerful creatures, or even one another in battle. From PvP Leagues, limited-time Raid battles, or taking on NPCs, Trainers are bound to engage in some form of combat throughout their adventures. For the best chances of success in Pokemon GO battles, players will aim to use the most powerful specimens in the game. This often involves teams consisting of one or more Legendary, Pesudo-Legandary, or Mega-Evolved Pokemon.

Mega Salamence is one of the many Mega Pokemon available in the game, and its most recent rotation in Raid Battles being within the Shared Skies season, many players are now looking to utilize this creature. For everything you need to know about the best moveset options for Mega Salamence and how to prepare it for battle, you can find all of the information you'll need in the guide below.

Best Moveset For Mega Salamence in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , Mega Salamence is a Dual-Type creature with Dragon and Flying attributes. This Type combination means Mega Salamence is weak to Dragon, Fairy, and Rock Type Pokemon or moves. In addition to this, Mega Salamence has a 2x weakness to Ice Types, so you should avoid wielding this creature in battles against enemies of those Types.

However, Mega Salamence is favorable in matchups against Bug, Ground, Fighting, Fire, Water, and Grass Types, so players should look to prioritize using it in these scenarios. Lastly, Mega Salamence can have its power boosted when battling in Windy weather, so players can take advantage of this by choosing to focus battles at these locations.

Best Mega Salamence Moveset

When Mega Salemence is equipped with the best moveset combination, which has been identified below, you can expect this Pokemon to dish out around 21.44 damage per second , and a total damage output of approximately 914.43 before it faints in battle.

  • Fast Move : Psycho Cut
  • Charged Move : Future Sight

However, there may be a number of different reasons that you may need to, or choose to tweak this moveset combination, such as Type coverage, or predicting the enemy Pokemon you will be going up against. For this reason, a list of suitable alternatives have been suggested, ordered by damage potential.

Secondary Mega Salamence Moveset Options

item.title: Genshin Impact Leak Hints at Citlali and Ororon Weapon Types
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • New Genshin Impact characters Citlali and Ororon use catalyst and bow, with Cryo vision excitement.
  • A new leak suggests Citlali and Ororon will not be in the 5.1 update, fans speculate 5.2 release for the duo.
  • Recent releases are Muani and Kachina in Version 5.0, with hopes for Citlali and Ororon as five-star characters.

A new Genshin Impact leak has revealed more details about two characters who are expected to join the playable roster in the future. The arrival of a new major region in Genshin Impact is, for many Travelers, considered the most important annual occasion, as it introduces tons of new content, including new playable units.

The ongoing Version 5.0 has already added two new playable characters, the five-star Hydro user Mualani and the four-star Geo polearm user Kachina. Players can obtain a copy of Kachina for free by progressing through the Archon Quest, while the second part of Genshin Impact 5.0 will also introduce a new five-star Dendro user, Kinich.

Genshin Impact 's Natlan teaser videos have introduced numerous new characters, most of whom are expected to join the roster in the future. Two of these characters are Citlali and Ororon. A new post by a credible leaker named Mero has revealed more information about Citlali's and Ororon's weapon types. According to the leak, Citlali will be a new catalyst user, while Ororon will use a bow as his main weapon. Citlali's appearance in the Ignition Teaser: A Name Forged in Flames has confirmed that she has a Cryo Vision, which has excited the community, as Cryo characters have been somewhat neglected over the last couple of months.

Genshin Impact: Citlali and Ororon Leaks and Release Date Speculations

There is not much information about Citlali other than that she comes from the Masters of the Night Wind tribe. The mysterious Ororon also belongs to the same tribe. While there is no official information or credible leaks about their rarity, many fans hope both characters will be five-star units. The last Cryo character to join the roster was Writhesley, who arrived in Genshin Impact Version 4.1.

Regarding their release date, the only confirmed information is that they won't be part of the upcoming Genshin Impact Update 5.1, as HoYoverse has already revealed their roster additions for the next update. The only new character in 5.1 will be the five-star Geo user Xilonen, which means the update will feature three banner reruns.

There is a chance that HoYoverse may include them in Version 5.2, since credible leakers have revealed that Genshin Impact 5.3 should be reserved for the Pyro Archon Mavuika. Archons are usually the most popular characters in the community, so sales-wise, it would not make sense for HoYoverse to pair them with another popular character release in the same update.

item.title: Black Myth: Wukong - All Pill Locations
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Pills in Black Wind Mountain
  • All Pills in Yellow Wind Ridge
  • All Pills in The New West
  • All Pills in The Webbed Hollow
  • All Pills in Flaming Mountains

Every chapter in Black Myth: Wukong introduces a new region to explore, filled with new armors to craft, materials to find, and lesser Yaoguais to defeat. Players can find three Celestial Pills in every chapter, which permanently increase Health, Mana, and Stamina. Most of these pills are along the main route, so players can pick them up as they head to the next area boss. This guide includes the locations of all of the Celestial Pills in Black Myth: Wukong .

In the second chapter in Yellow Wind Ridge, players will come across Xu-Dog , who gives you nine of each Celestial Pill in exchange for Mind Cores. However, players will first have to help him in the Sandgate Village.

All Pills in Black Wind Mountain

Pill

Location

Celestial Jade Lotus Pill

Guanyin Temple (Forest of Wolves)

Celestial Taiyi Pill

Cave Interior (Black Wind Cave)

Celestial Nonary Pill

Outside the Cave (Black Wind Cave)

Refer to this guide for a more in-depth breakdown of the Pills in Black Wind Mountain.

All Pills in Yellow Wind Ridge

Cellar (Crouching Tiger Temple)

Celestial Taiyi Pill

item.title: The Best First-Person Shooters Of All Time
item.description: The FPS genre has more than enough games within to satisfy players' run-and-gun needs for a lifetime. However, that doesn't mean all games are worth their time. We've put together a list of the all-time best first-person shooter games so you know which one to play or re-play next.
